verses.name: Jeremiah 48:20
verses.text: Moab is confounded; for it is broken down: howl and cry; tell ye it in Arnon, that Moab is spoiled,

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:21
verses.text: And judgment is come upon the plain country; upon Holon, and upon Jahazah, and upon Mephaath,

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:22
verses.text: And upon Dibon, and upon Nebo, and upon Beth–diblathaim,

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:23
verses.text: And upon Kiriathaim, and upon Beth–gamul, and upon Beth–meon,

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:24
verses.text: And upon Kerioth, and upon Bozrah, and upon all the cities of the land of Moab, far or near.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:25
verses.text: The horn of Moab is cut off, and his arm is broken, saith the Lord.
